title: Breach of condition; penalty
context: §445-136 Breach of condition; penalty. Every licensed pawnbroker who fails to comply with any of the provisions of this part shall be fined not more than $2,500 for each violation and shall forfeit the pawnbroker&rsquo;s license. [L 1886, c 28, §5; am L 1903, c 8, §2; RL 1925, §2076; RL 1935, §2497; RL 1945, §7101; RL 1955, §155-81; HRS §445-136; gen ch 1985; am L 1992, c 192, §5]
